{"id":417891349,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"2 years, 10 months","timestamp":1604797307,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"244 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/417891349/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Distinct Islands","memory":"17.8 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def numDistinctIslands(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        \"\"\"\n        DFS + path signature\n        \"\"\"\n        row = len(grid)\n        col = len(grid[0])\n        seen = set()\n        \n        def dfs(r, c, di = 0):\n            if 0 <= r < row and 0 <= c < col and grid[r][c] and (r, c) not in seen:\n                seen.add((r, c))\n                shape.append(di)\n                dfs(r - 1, c, 1)\n                dfs(r + 1, c, 2)\n                dfs(r, c - 1, 3)\n                dfs(r, c + 1, 4)\n                shape.append(0)\n        \n        res = 0\n        shapes = set()\n        for r in range(row):\n            for c in range(col):\n                shape = []\n                dfs(r, c)\n                if shape:\n                    if tuple(shape) not in shapes:\n                        res += 1\n                        shapes.add(tuple(shape))\n        return res","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-distinct-islands","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
